info.title: Clock-Time
info.author: TRY
info.details:
The Switch Clock app, light n' dark mode yeahh !

Commands
Press Plus to quit and tap the screen to change mode, beetween dark and bright

Instructions
Put the .nro file wherever you want just don't run it in appelet mode, use R and run a game to go into non appelt mode hbmenu
